column4: hello everyone, i have a question: i want to install linux ubuntu 11.10 on an old laptop running xp actually. unfortunately after the POST i can't boot from CD or USB (i don't know why) and if i try to use wubi it gives me the following error: 'WindowsBackend' object has no attribute 'CD_path' any ideas how i can solve this?
it says that the CD is not bootable
You might need to update your BIOS then
